PageInfo.Message:
During the Main Quest progress, <COL
ffdc78>《Progress Marker》</COL> appears at the
checkpoint location.
Whether playing solo or in a party, the player
leading the progression (the leader in party play)
advances the Main Quest to the next event by
touching the 《Progress Marker》.

However, during party play, if a progress marker
occurs at a key point in the main quest, everyone
must gather at the marker.
When a <COL ffdc78>"Party Summoning" request is
received from the leader, members should also
touch the marker and enter a "Preparation
Complete" state</COL>, then wait.
There are also doors that have the same function.
